mapper.sql: id, is_deleted, add_time, modified_time, role_id, permission_id
mapper.select: select permission_id from t_sys_role_permission where role_id = #{roleId} and is_deleted=0
mapper.insert: insert into t_sys_role_permission (id, is_deleted, add_time, modified_time, role_id, permission_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{addTime,jdbcType=OTHER,typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.LocalDateTimeTypeHandler}, #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=OTHER,typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.LocalDateTimeTypeHandler}, #{roleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{permissionId,jdbcType=BIGINT})

mapper.update:
update t_sys_role_permission
is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=TINYINT},
add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=OTHER,typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.LocalDateTimeTypeHandler},
modified_time = #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=OTHER,typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.LocalDateTimeTypeHandler},
role_id = #{roleId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
permission_id = #{permissionId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
